## VariableMap.addVariable() method

Adds the given variable to this variable map.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addVariable(variable: IVariableModel<IVariableState>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  variable | [IVariableModel](./blockly.ivariablemodel.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IVariableState](./blockly.ivariablestate.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The variable to add. |

void
